scripts.test_gui_all_show: npm run clean_all && npx cypress run -b chrome --spec cypress/integration/GUI/**/*.spec.js --reporter mochawesome --parallel --record --key projeto_base --ci-build-id build-ALL-$(date +%j)-$(date +%T) && npm run junta_gera_rel
scripts.test_gui_all_show_local_firefox: npm run clean_all && npx cypress run -b firefox --spec cypress/integration/GUI/**/*.spec.js --env configFile=local --reporter mochawesome --parallel --record --key projeto_base --ci-build-id build-ALL-$(date +%j)-$(date +%T) && npm run junta_gera_rel
scripts.test_all: npm run clean_all && npx cypress run --headless -b chrome --spec cypress/integration/**/**/*.spec.js --reporter mochawesome --parallel --record --key projeto_base --ci-build-id build-ALL-$(date +%j)-$(date +%T) && npm run junta_gera_rel
scripts.test_all_local: npm run clean_all && npx cypress run --headless -b chrome --spec cypress/integration/**/**/*.spec.js --env configFile=local --reporter mochawesome --parallel --record --key projeto_base --ci-build-id build-ALL-$(date +%j)-$(date +%T) && npm run junta_gera_rel
scripts.test_gui_all: npx cypress run --headless -b chrome --spec cypress/integration/GUI/**/*.spec.js --reporter mochawesome --parallel --record --key projeto_base --ci-build-id build-GUI-$(date +%j)-$(date +%T)
scripts.test_api_all: npx cypress run --spec cypress/integration/API/**/*.spec.js --reporter mochawesome --parallel --record --key projeto_base --ci-build-id build-API-$(date +%j)-$(date +%T)
scripts.create_10_users: npx cypress run --spec cypress/integration/Massa_de_Testes/POST_create_users.spec.js --reporter mochawesome --parallel --record --key projeto_base --ci-build-id build-MASSA-$(date +%j)-$(date +%T)
scripts.create_10_products: npx cypress run --spec cypress/integration/Massa_de_Testes/POST_create_product.spec.js --reporter mochawesome --parallel --record --key projeto_base --ci-build-id build-MASSA-$(date +%j)-$(date +%T)
scripts.create_10_users_products: npm run create_10_users && npm run create_10_products
scripts.test_create_users_api: npx cypress run --headless -b chrome --spec cypress/integration/API/POST_create_users.spec.js --reporter mochawesome --parallel --record --key projeto_base --ci-build-id build-$(date +%j)-$(date +%T)
scripts.test_login_api: npx cypress run --headless -b chrome --spec cypress/integration/API/POST_login.spec.js --reporter mochawesome --parallel --record --key projeto_base --ci-build-id build-$(date +%j)-$(date +%T)
scripts.test_create_product_api: npx cypress run --headless -b chrome --spec cypress/integration/API/POST_create_product.spec.js --reporter mochawesome --parallel --record --key projeto_base --ci-build-id build-$(date +%j)-$(date +%T)
scripts.test_edit_users_api: npx cypress run --headless -b chrome --spec cypress/integration/API/PUT_edit_users.spec.js --reporter mochawesome --parallel --record --key projeto_base --ci-build-id build-$(date +%j)-$(date +%T)
scripts.test_create_gui: npx cypress run --headless -b chrome --spec cypress/integration/GUI/create_project.spec.js --reporter mochawesome --parallel --record --key projeto_base --ci-build-id build-$(date +%j)-$(date +%T)
scripts.test_edit_gui: npx cypress run --headless -b chrome --spec cypress/integration/GUI/edit_project.spec.js --reporter mochawesome --parallel --record --key projeto_base --ci-build-id build-$(date +%j)-$(date +%T)
scripts.test_delete_gui: npx cypress run --headless -b chrome --spec cypress/integration/GUI/delete_project.spec.js --reporter mochawesome --parallel --record --key projeto_base --ci-build-id build-$(date +%j)-$(date +%T)
